Commande: sudo apt install --allow-change-held-packages -y git golang make

[Unit]
Description=iptables exporter
After=network.target

[Service]
User=iptables_exporter
ExecStart=/opt/iptables_exporter/iptables_exporter --web.listen-address=:9145
Restart=always

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
sudo systemctl daemon-reload && sudo systemctl enable --now iptables_exporter
